description:
What is it: Configures logging to capture Azure sign-in events, which can then be analyzed using Log Analytics Workspaces. 
 Simeon Notes: Provides you with the data needed to monitor and be alerted on login activity within your tenant. Simeon’s baseline captures all audit logs as well as all sign-in attempts. Logs can be viewed in the Analytics Workspace named ‘tenant Name-M365logging’ and are stored in the Azure Storage Account named tenantNameM365Logging. 
 Learn More: https://docs.microsoft.com/en-us/azure/active-directory/reports-monitoring/howto-analyze-activity-logs-log-analytics
